DataElement.preferredName: Persistent Biological Detection Test Gene Therapy Product Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not biological tests were performed to detect persistence of the gene therapy product.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Persistent Biological Detection Test Gene Therapy Product Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Retained; never-ceasing._The determination of presence or absence of a biological entity in a specimen.:Application of genetic material (usually DNA) into cells in order to permanently correct an inherited disease or acquired disease._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Retained; never-ceasing._The determination of presence or absence of a biological entity in a specimen.

Property.preferredDefinition: Application of genetic material (usually DNA) into cells in order to permanently correct an inherited disease or acquired disease._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced._Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: Application of genetic material (usually DNA) into cells in order to permanently correct an inherited disease or acquired disease.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
